Author: WorkingHardInIt
Summary: When you’re connecting a home (or perhaps even an office) lab to Azure with a site-2-site VPN you’ll probably have to deal with the fact that you have a dynamic IP assigned by your ISP. This means unless you update the VPN Gateway Address of your Azure local network in some aut
Title: Runbook to update S2S  VPN Gateway with dynamic IP address of ISP
